title: Bins vs. Rubbish [game trailer]
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Waste disposal - Environmental aspects
abstract: A fun strategy game that lets you dodge, catch and shoot rubbish. This trailer illustrates how the game is played.
description: A short excerpt from a computer game created for the 2010 'Screen It' competition. This fun strategy game lets you dodge, catch and shoot rubbish. The message is to stop littering, as it can hurt animals and increase global warming.  This trailer illustrates how the game is played.
